title: lol.launcher.admin.exe Error (Close Program) :(
body: Hi Guys please i want ur Help :( My LOL client Does not Work When i opens Lol.lancher its says Close the Program its always opens correctly at the First time then i logout and trying To opens it again at the 2nd Time always Says Close Program Error **Please Help me** :((

replies.body: It looks like something must have gone wrong with your League installation and know your pc can't quite get it to run the way it's meant to. With cases like these it's best to grab our [**Hextech Repair Tool**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367-Automated-Troubleshooting-Hextech-Repair-Tool) and run it with a **reinstall and clean uninstall** to make sure everything is working properly.

I did what u say bro and the tool gave me that file but the game still did not open 

https://www.mediafire.com/?cm3godxq2uudghb

Make sure that you ran it with those two options checked, but if reinstalling wasn't able to help hit up our tech guys in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) with those logs the HRT gave you. They can look over those to see what's going on and how we need to tackle the issue.
This is the photo of the error http://imgur.com/a/MfMQK
